title: How to download music from Google Play to an MP3 player - Quora

response.answer_text: I have bought tracks from Google Play music on my laptop and downloaded them to the windows downloads folder. From there I can put them onto whatever device. You can do it from the Google Play music website or app. If you download bought tracks to your phone they are encrypted and can only by played on the Google Play music app. So, short version - do it all on your computer and select download album from the track's options. Regards Gerard
